revised_title: In Memoriam: Celebrating the Lives and Contributions of Notable Scientists
tldr: In this address, Sir Ernest Rutherford honors the memory of notable scientists who passed away in the previous year, including Hendrik Lorentz, W.H. Dines, Sir Aubrey Strahan, Sir David Ferrier, and many others. These individuals made significant contributions to fields such as physics, geology, astronomy, medicine, and engineering. The address also highlights their personal achievements and the impact they had on their respective scientific communities.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Biographies
